mapper.insert: insert into exam_examroom (pkid, `order`, `name`, spaceid, sortnum, createtime, userid, `type`) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update exam_examroom set `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spaceid = #{spaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, `order`, `name`, spaceid, sortnum, createtime, userid, `type` from exam_examroom
select pkid, `order`, `name`, spaceid, sortnum, createtime, userid, `type` from exam_examroom WHERE spaceid=#{0} limit 1
